Eugenics-42.op_claim: I believe all mentally disabled people should be sterilized. CMV

reply_contents.content: In itself, I don't believe this is a bad idea
elo_info: In itself, I don't believe this is a bad idea

reply_contents.content: The problem is the precedent it sets
elo_info: The problem is the precedent it sets

reply_contents.content: Right now, we as a citizenry are generally pretty adamant about having the rights to control our own bodies
elo_info: Right now, we as a citizenry are generally pretty adamant about having the rights to control our own bodies

reply_contents.content: The government can physically move your body somewhere like jail, but that's about all we'll let it do
elo_info: The government can physically move your body somewhere like jail, but that's about all we'll let it do

reply_contents.content: If "all mentally disabled people are to be sterilized" were to be come law tomorrow, it would set the precedent that the government can forcibly sterilize someone
elo_info: If “all mentally disabled people are to be sterilized” were to be come law tomorrow, it would set the precedent that the government can forcibly sterilize someone

elo_info.message: Use a smart opening quote here: '“'.
Use a smart closing quote here: '”'.

reply_contents.content: The government can control someone's body - and not just for their own good, but for the good of society
elo_info: The government can control someone's body - and not just for their own good, but for the good of society

reply_contents.content: Slippery slope is a fallacy in most arguments, but precedents are very important in law
elo_info: Slippery slope is a fallacy in most arguments, but precedents are very important in law

reply_contents.content: If the government can exercise control over someone's body for the good of society, what will they want to do next
elo_info: If the government can exercise control over someone's body for the good of society, what will they want to do next

reply_contents.content: Maybe forcibly sterilize everyone convicted of a felony - after all, those people's kids are far more likely to end up as criminals
elo_info: Maybe forcibly sterilize everyone convicted of a felony - after all, those people's kids are far more likely to end up as criminals

reply_contents.content: Society would be better off without them
elo_info: Society would be better off without them

reply_contents.content: It's also a difficult system to implement perfectly
elo_info: It's also a difficult system to implement perfectly

reply_contents.content: IQ tests have been shown to have many flaws
elo_info: IQ tests have been shown to have many flaws

reply_contents.content: Do you know why we don't require an intelligence test before voting
elo_info: Do you know why we don't require an intelligence test before voting

reply_contents.content: Because it's incredibly likely that the test would end up politically biased and cut out one or the other party's support
elo_info: Because it's incredibly likely that the test would end up politically biased and cut out one or the other party's support

reply_contents.content: It's easy to imagine this policy ending up in a similar way, where liberal views or conservative views are recorded as signs of retardation and tip the scale toward sterilization
elo_info: It's easy to imagine this policy ending up in a similar way, where liberal views or conservative views are recorded as signs of retardation and tip the scale toward sterilization

elo_info.message: Consider replacing "in a similar way" with adverb for "similar"; eg, "in a hasty manner" with "hastily".

reply_contents.content: Not to mention things like IQ tests often end up racially biased
elo_info: Not to mention things like IQ tests often end up racially biased

reply_contents.content: You're using the passive voice here, and it obscures a major problem with your idea
elo_info: You're using the passive voice here, and it obscures a major problem with your idea

reply_contents.content: Who gets to judge if someone is disabled enough to be sterilized
elo_info: Who gets to judge if someone is disabled enough to be sterilized

reply_contents.content: Who performs the sterilization
elo_info: Who performs the sterilization

elo_info.message: “Who” at the beginning of a sentence requires a 2nd clause. Maybe a comma, question or exclamation mark is missing, or the sentence is incomplete and should be joined with the following sentence.

reply_contents.content: Why do you think anyone has a right to fill either of these roles
elo_info: Why do you think anyone has a right to fill either of these roles
